bibl.title: Exploring the Common Identification of Three New Testament Manuscripts: P4, P64 and P67.
bibl.note: P. Paris Bibl. Nat. Suppl. Gr. Inv. 1120 (= van Haelst 403), P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 336 (2)) et P. Barc. Inv. 1 (= van Haelst 336 (1)). - Non vidimus. Cf. Internationale Zeitschriftenschau für Bibelwissenschaft 41 (1994-1995) No. 52.
bibl.seg: COMFORT Philip W., Exploring the Common Identification of Three New Testament Manuscripts: P4, P64 and P67.

P. Paris Bibl. Nat. Suppl. Gr. Inv. 1120 (= van Haelst 403), P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 336 (2)) et P. Barc. Inv. 1 (= van Haelst 336 (1)). - Non vidimus. Cf. Internationale Zeitschriftenschau für Bibelwissenschaft 41 (1994-1995) No. 52.
